column5: Was looking through some of my old videos from early this year…..cant wait for the snow!

I look forward as well, but no need to be hasty...  It'll be here for the long run in no time.  I'm still hoping for another handful of open water trips, but it's tough to find a decent weather day between everything else this time of the year.
yeah, it's coming, I love all the seasons  I wish I had some time off work to enjoy to enjoy the late fall, who knows, I can throw my back out picking up a quarter off the side walk
please we need global warming in southern Ontario. ice belongs in drinks,not lakes
please we need global warming in southern Ontario.   Might already be here George, I've still got a flock of robins living  around here and had 12 on the lawn an hour ago.
please we need global warming in southern Ontario. ice belongs in drinks,not lakes    SHUN THE NON BELIEVER…….SHUUUUUN.
Winter brings me work and great evenings on Nipissing, so ya, bring it on. I put new studded winters on my car, so im also looking forward to ripping up the roads too.
Love this video Simon. Makes me itch to get the sled out.

yeah, it's coming, I love all the seasons  I wish I had some time off work to enjoy to enjoy the late fall, who knows, I can throw my back out picking up a quarter off the side walk  Simon, yeah I have started checking new ice fishing gear for 2014 , like i really need it .... LOL  Chris, i know exactly what you mean ...
Lol Julian…….they still haven't got the ice fishing mags on the shelves here…FFS….WE LIVE IN NWO PEOPLE!!!!!!  Hey Gordo….we gotta get out for a ride somewhere this year eh?
Sounds good Simon. I haven't done near enough riding these past few years.
Have all the snow and ice you want just pleasssseeeeeeee keep it up North.   thank you   Art
Yes bring it on !!!! Both my sleds are ready to go!!
Please ,not here yet.Give us till Christmas anyways ,lol.

Smaller lakes here are frozen and bigger lakes have frozen launches. The good news is it's finally getting decently cold and should make some ice pretty quickly. Looking @ -20 lows on the weekend. We do need snow though, I just hope it waits until there is a decent level of ice because overflow sucks!!!
I did however get my snow blower out of storage shed and fired it up over the weekend
Simon the word "mutiny" was created for captains for lesser wishes...
Must be time to dust off the sled,   Love the smell of two stroke on a cold winters morning.
I will confess to getting the backplow blade ready for a speedy hookup.    Art
Simon the word "mutiny" was created for captains for lesser wishes... A pirates life for me!
if it snows I will have to get my wife a new shovel this year. not only does snow disgust me. im cheap. lol.. im just kiddin guys.
A pirates life for me! AAAAAHRRRR BE DAAAAHR !

-9 last night and a skim over the ponds and ground getting firmed up...But i still managed a few troots in the pal today so all is well.  Take it as it comes i guess.  I cant wait for my first northern marathon (sprinting to the far tipup)
the lakes and rivers don't freeze here so the ice and snow  just make any open water forays nasty, keep it up there
